select pi.id, pi.title, pi.content, pi.images, pi.user_id, pi.create_date, pi.pageviews, pi.tag_ids, pi.delete_flag, si.name as studentName, si.images as studentImages, group_concat( ti.NAME ) as tagName from post_info pi left join student_info si on (si.id = pi.user_id) LEFT JOIN tag_info ti ON FIND_IN_SET(ti.id , pi.tag_ids) where 1 = 1
AND si.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{postInfo.studentName},'%')
AND pi.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{postInfo.title},'%')
AND pi.tag_ids LIKE CONCAT('%',#{postInfo.tagId},'%')
group by pi.id order by pi.create_date desc

SELECT pi.id, pi.title, pi.content, pi.images, pi.user_id AS userId, pi.create_date AS createDate, pi.pageviews, pi.tag_ids AS tagIds, pi.delete_flag AS deleteFlag, tu.name as username, tu.images AS userImages, IFNULL(SUM(ri.post_id), 0) AS reply FROM post_info pi LEFT JOIN student_info tu ON ( tu.id = pi.user_id ) LEFT JOIN reply_info ri ON ( ri.post_id = pi.id ) AND ri.delete_flag = 0 WHERE 1 = 1
AND pi.title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{postInfo.title},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{postInfo.username},'%')
AND FIND_IN_SET(#{ postInfo.tagId }, pi.tag_ids)
AND pi.user_id = #{postInfo.userId}
GROUP BY pi.id ORDER BY pi.create_date DESC

SELECT pi.id, pi.title, pi.content, pi.images, pi.user_id AS userId, pi.create_date AS createDate, pi.pageviews, pi.tag_ids AS tagIds, pi.delete_flag AS deleteFlag, tu.name as username, tu.images as userImages, IFNULL(COUNT(ri.id), 0) AS reply FROM post_info pi LEFT JOIN student_info tu ON ( tu.id = pi.user_id ) LEFT JOIN reply_info ri ON ( ri.post_id = pi.id ) AND ri.delete_flag = 0 WHERE pi.delete_flag = 0 AND FIND_IN_SET(#{ tagId }, pi.tag_ids) GROUP BY pi.id ORDER BY pi.create_date DESC

SELECT pi.id, pi.title, pi.content, pi.images, pi.user_id AS userId, pi.create_date AS createDate, pi.pageviews, pi.tag_ids AS tagIds, pi.delete_flag AS deleteFlag, tu.name as username, tu.images as userImages, IFNULL(COUNT(ri.id), 0) AS reply FROM post_info pi LEFT JOIN student_info tu ON ( tu.id = pi.user_id ) LEFT JOIN reply_info ri ON ( ri.post_id = pi.id ) AND ri.delete_flag = 0 WHERE pi.id = #{ postId }
